newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak Sept key M2 money up 19.0 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Slovak Sept key M2 money up 19.0 pct yr/yr.

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) on Thursday said its key money supply measure, M2, was up 19.0 percent year-on-year in September, compared with a 19.5 percent rise in August.
SLOVAK MONEY SUPPLY Sept'96 Aug'96 Sept'95
Note. M2 measures currency, demand and time deposits, savings deposits, and foreign currency deposits.
